query: SELECT Country, Segment, Product_1 as Product, SUM(CAST(GrossSales as DECIMAL(18,2))) as TotalRevenue, SUM(CAST(Profit as DECIMAL(18,2))) as TotalProfit, COUNT(*) as TransactionCount FROM [Upload_edaa4303640341b48950bb3eb0385f60_20251215203858] WHERE CAST(GrossSales as DECIMAL(18,2)) > 100000 AND CAST(Profit as DECIMAL(18,2)) > 0 AND Year = '2014' GROUP BY Country, Segment, Product_1 HAVING SUM(CAST(GrossSales as DECIMAL(18,2))) > 500000 ORDER BY TotalRevenue DESC
